<<<<<<< HEAD
An universal prayer for all which regards salvation
4 p.
printed and sold by William Weston, printer, and stationerto [sic], the King's most Excellent Majesty, for his houshold and chappel, [St. Germain : [1695?]]
Imprint from colophon; publication date conjectured by Wing. Caption title. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
